abstract: Commerce Department says orders for durable nonmilitary capital goods excluding aircraft rose 2.2 percent in July, biggest increase since June 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said orders for nonmilitary capital goods orders excluding aircraft had their largest increase in a year last month.

headline.main: Business Investment Gauge Highlights Strength of U.S. Economy
headline.print_headline: A Measure of Business Investment Plans Jumped in July, Its Largest Rise in a Year

snippet: The Commerce Department said orders for nonmilitary capital goods orders excluding aircraft had their largest increase in a year last month.
